CONSOLE WARNING: line 3078: Element.createShadowRoot is deprecated and will be removed in M73, around March 2019. Please use Element.attachShadow instead. See https://www.chromestatus.com/features/4507242028072960 for more details.
Tests the way service workers don't enable DOM agent and does enable Debugger agent.

Debugger-related command should be issued: {
    "id": "<id>",
    "method": "Target.sendMessageToTarget",
    "params": {
        "message": {
            "id": "<id>",
            "method": "Target.sendMessageToTarget",
            "params": {
                "message": {
                    "id": "<id>",
                    "method": "Debugger.enable"
                },
                "sessionId": "<id>"
            }
        },
        "sessionId": "<id>"
    }
}
Suspending targets.
Resuming targets.
Debugger-related command should be issued: {
    "id": "<id>",
    "method": "Target.sendMessageToTarget",
    "params": {
        "message": {
            "id": "<id>",
            "method": "Target.sendMessageToTarget",
            "params": {
                "message": {
                    "id": "<id>",
                    "method": "Debugger.enable"
                },
                "sessionId": "<id>"
            }
        },
        "sessionId": "<id>"
    }
}
